results.title: Effect of atenolol on cadmium-induced testicular toxicity in male rats.
results.text_hl: All the parameters were similar to control levels in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ alone. We conclude that @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ may protect testicular androgen synthesis by inhibiting the action of @CHEMICAL_Norepinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009638 @@@noradrenaline@@@ on testicular Leydig cells and @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Cortex_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000306 @@@adrenocortical hyperactivity@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Cadmium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002104 @@@cadmium@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Biswas NM, Sen Gupta R, Chattopadhyay A, Choudhury GR, Sarkar M. Effect of atenolol on cadmium-induced testicular toxicity in male rats. Reprod Toxicol. 2001 Nov-Dec;15(6):699-704. PMID: 11738523
